  <h3>Hotel Catalonia Atenas</h3>
  <p>Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the **Atenas Catalonia** has a **rooftop swimming pool**, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and **Sagrada Familia**. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of **Hotel Atenas Barcelona** have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a **show cooking**. There is a **snack bar** and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

**The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel**, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.</p>
